info.title: Merk API
info.description:
This is Merk API - your programmatic gateway to company data for the Czech Republic and Slovakia.

### Signing up

If you would like to take advantage of access to the most comprehensive company database
for the Czech Republic and Slovakia **you need to be a registered user of Merk**.
Registration to Merk is free and you can do it
[here](https://www.merk.cz/accounts/register/?utm_source=api_doc&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api).
After the registration we will contact you and activate your account.

### Getting API key

Log in to your activated account and go to the tab [Connection (Napojeni)](https://www.merk.cz/api/about/).
Your API key will be displayed there. In case you need to reset the key, use the Reset key button.

For most of the requests will need your API key. Use the Authorization HTTP header to authenticate yourself:

`Authorization: Token {api_key}`

For example this would be a sample API call using curl:

`curl -X GET -H 'Authorization: Token {api_key}' 'https://api.merk.cz/company/?regno=14915'`

### Contact & Changelog

If you need more, let us know at <podpora@merk.cz>.
To catch up with all API news, feel free to bookmark our [CHANGELOG](https://api.merk.cz/changelog).

get.summary: Detailed company info for given registration (ICO) or VAT number
get.description:
You should consult [enums](/docs/#/enums) endpoint for further information on returned values.
        This endpoint is throttled to **60 requests per minute**.

parameters.name: regno
parameters.description: regno (DIC or IC DPH) in international format f.e. CZ00014915

parameters.name: regno
parameters.description: Company registration number (IC) with or without leading zeros

403.description: Expired account; Assigned API calls limit exhausted

post.summary: Detailed company info for given registration numbers
post.description:
Maximum allowed number of regnos is **500** per request.
            Request example (`Content-Type: application/json`):
            `{"regnos":[28547888,25523431], "country_code":"cz"}`
            Request example (`Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded`):
            `country_code=cz&regnos=28547888&regnos=25523431`
            You should consult [enums](/docs/#/enums) endpoint for further information on returned values.
            This endpoint is throttled to **60 requests per minute**.

400.description: Missing regno parameter; Too many regnos passed; Bad regno format; Bad country_code;

403.description: Expired account; Assigned API calls limit exhausted

get.summary: Graph representation of relations of the given COMPANY
get.description:
Returns list of items you can use to construct directed graph of companies and persons.
            Returned items are either nodes (company or person) or edges (relations). Every node has `id`
            property which is used in relations as `source` or `target` values. You can use either `company_id`
            or `person_id` ids for next queries.
        This endpoint is throttled to **30 requests per minute**.

400.description: No parameters; Bad parameter value

403.description: Expired account; API disabled

get.summary: Graph representation of relations of the given PERSON
get.description:
Returns list of items you can use to construct directed graph of companies and persons.
            Returned items are either nodes (company or person) or edges (relations). Every node has `id`
            property which is used in relations as `source` or `target` values. You can use either `company_id`
            or `person_id` ids for next queries.
        This endpoint is throttled to **30 requests per minute**.

400.description: No parameters; Bad parameter value

403.description: Expired account; API disabled

post.summary: Search for czech companies matching the specified filters.
post.description:
Search cz/sk companies by filters.
This endpoint allows you to search for companies based on various filters such as industry, location, turnover and other attributes.
The results will include detailed information about the companies that match the search criteria. 

Results are paginated, response provides link to the next page.

This endpoint is throttled to **600 requests per minute**.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query parameter is utilized for full-text search of companies by name.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: The ordering parameter specifies the order in which the results are returned. Acceptable multiple order query param example: `/?ordering=-turnover_id,magnitude_id,name`

403.description: Expired account; Assigned API calls limit exhausted

get.summary: Find companies by name, email etc.
get.description:
Method for getting basic company data for provided name (or part of it), email address, bank account number or regno (=IČ, unique identifier of CZ and SK companies). It is a good data source for your application completion suggesters (f.e. [typeahead](https://twitter.github.io/typeahead.js/))

Companies can be suggested using one of ways listed below:

* from a **name** (or part of it) of the company using **name** parameter,
* or from an **email** using **email** parameter,
* or from an **bank account number** using **bank_account** parameter,
* or from a **regno** using **regno** parameter - exact match (default) or from beginning of regno (with param expand_regno).

Response is **limited to 10 best matching subjects** (if applicable). Every successful response will increase your api hits (suggest_hits). You can check your current hits and monthly limit at [subscriptions](/docs/#operation/subscriptions_list) endpoint.

And yes, we do provide ready to use javascript library [merk-suggest-company-js](https://github.com/impercz/merk-suggest-company-js) ;)

This endpoint is throttled to **600 requests per minute**.

parameters.name: regno
parameters.description: Company registration number (IC) with or without leading zeros

400.description: No parameters; Name is too short; Invalid email; Invalid regno; Invalid country code

403.description: Expired account; Assigned API calls limit exhausted

post.description:
Method to send us feedback on suggested data.
            In case user would correct (f.e. some of the suggested fields having outdated information) suggested data you can send such data back to us to improve our database. That way both sides can benefit from it.

400.description: No data or regno parameters; Invalid regno

403.description: Expired account

get.summary: List of user-defined tags
get.description:
Tags assigned by users from your company (which share same email domain).
            This endpoint is throttled to **60 requests per hour**.

GraphItem.description: List of nodes and relations; see GraphItem

id.title: Id
id.description: Id used in relation source|target fields

label.title: Label
label.description: Determines item types, you can get either graph nodes: "company|person" or "relation" between nodes

type.title: Type
type.description: RELATION only: determines relation type: current|historic

legal_form_id.title: Legal form id
legal_form_id.description: COMPANY node only: legal form id (see enums)

company_id.title: Company id
company_id.description: COMPANY node only: company id (can be used in queries)

is_active.title: Is active
is_active.description: COMPANY node only: is company active?

name.title: Name
name.description: COMPANY OR PERSON node only: company name / person name

person_id.title: Person id
person_id.description: PERSON node only: person id (can bude used in queries)

country_code.title: Country code
country_code.description: PERSON node only: country of residence

birth_date.title: Birth date
birth_date.description: PERSON node only: birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format

city.title: City
city.description: PERSON node only: city of residence

date_to.title: Date to
date_to.description: RELATION only: relation start date in YYYY-MM-DD format, null if still active in company

date_from.title: Date from
date_from.description: RELATION only: relation end date in YYYY-MM-DD format

company_role.title: Company role
company_role.description: RELATION only: node's function in company

company_role_id.title: Company role id
company_role_id.description: RELATION only: node's function in company (see enums)

company_function.title: Company function
company_function.description: RELATION only: node's function in company (more detailed)

capital.title: Capital
capital.description: RELATION only: node's capital invested in company

paid_up.title: Paid up
paid_up.description: RELATION only: node's capital paid up

share.title: Share
share.description: RELATION only: node's share in company

person_id.description: id can be used in other endpoints
